sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" function App(){ const [data,setData] = useState({}) const [location,setLocation] = useState('') const url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${location}&appid=33c4f1e4f3ea2eae6cf3ea8eb4f2ad3a` const searchLocation = (event) =>{ if(event.key === 'Enter'){ axios.get(url).then((response) => { setData(response.data) console.log(response.data) }) setLocation('') } } return(
setLocation(event.target.value)} onKeyPress={searchLocation} placeholder="Enter Location" type="text"/>

{data.name}

Clouds

65Â°F

Feels Like

humidity

12MPH

) } export default App
